entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
